column4: Exclusive: Tesla's 'long-haul' electric truck aims for 200 to 300 miles on a charge
column5: SAN FRANCISCO Tesla Inc  next month plans to unveil an electric big-rig truck with a working range of 200 to 300 miles  Reuters has learned  a sign that the electric car maker is targeting regional hauling for its entry into the commercial freight market.

column4: BRIEF-Qualcomm announces president  Derek Aberle  to leave company as of Dec 31 2017
